VIPurl = VIPurl+JSON.stringify(option); V = java.ajax(VIPurl); java.setContent(V); status = java.getString("$..status"); content = java.getString("$..content"); content = status=="success"?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):""; ruleContent.content:
<js>
islock = java.getString("$.islock");
if(islock=="0") {
	//ç®€ä»‹
	novelCover = java.getString("$.novelCover");
	let option = {"headers": {"User-Agent": "Dalvik/2.1.0"}};
	novelCover = novelCover+","+JSON.stringify(option);
	novelTags = String(java.getString("$.novelTags")).replace(/^(?=\S)|[,]/g,"ğŸ·ï¸");
	mainview = String(java.getString("$.mainview")).replace(/^(?=\S)/,"ä½œå“è§†è§’ï¼š");
	protagonist = String(java.getString("$.protagonist")).replace(/ä¸»è§’ï¼š$/,"");
	costar = String(java.getString("$.costar")).replace(/é…è§’ï¼š$/,"");
	other = String(java.getString("$.other")).replace(/å…¶å®ƒï¼š$/,"");
	novelIntroShort = String(java.getString("$.novelIntroShort")).replace(/^(?=\S)/,"ä¸€å¥è¯ç®€ä»‹ï¼š");
	novelIntro1 = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro")).replace(/.*ç«‹æ„[:]/,"ç«‹æ„ï¼š");
	commentcount = String(java.getString("$.comment_count")).replace(/\D/,"").replace(/^(?=\S)/,"æ€»ä¹¦è¯„æ•°ï¼š");
	novelbefavoritedcount = String(java.getString("$.novelbefavoritedcount")).replace(/^(?=\S)/,"å½“å‰è¢«æ”¶è—æ•°ï¼š");
	novelIntro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro")).replace(/\s*ç«‹æ„[:].*/,"");
	novelId = String(java.getString("$.novelId")).replace(/^(?=\S)/,"https://www.jjwxc.net/onebook.php?novelid=");
	codeUrl = java.getString("$.codeUrl");
	A = novelTags+"\n"+mainview+"\n"+protagonist+"\n"+costar+"\n"+other+"\n"+novelIntroShort+"\n"+novelIntro1+"\n"+commentcount+"\n"+novelbefavoritedcount+"\n‎\n"+novelIntro+"\n‎\n"+"ã€"+novelId+"ã€‘"+"\n"+"ã€"+codeUrl+"ã€‘"
	//è¯„è®º
	extend = book.getVariable("custom");
	commenturl = "https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+String(novelId).replace(/\D+/g,"");
	commentall = /1/.test(extend)?JSON.parse(java.ajax(commenturl)):"";
	cstate = commentall.state;
	if(cstate=="200") {
		cbody = commentall.body;
		commentL = "";
		for(i=0; i<cbody.length; i++) {
			let P = cbody[i];
			let foldlingauthor = P.foldlingauthor;
			let commentbody = P.commentbody;
			let pchapterid = P.chapterid;
			let commentmark = P.commentmark;
			let vip_chapter_icon = P.vip_chapter_icon;
			let subscriptionicon = P.subscriptionicon;
			let agreenum = P.agreenum;
			let ip_pos = P.ip_pos;
			let commentdate = P.commentdate;
			subscriptionicon = subscriptionicon==""?"":"ã€€"+subscriptionicon;
			agreenum = agreenum=="0"?"":"ğŸ‘ã€"+agreenum+"ã€‘ã€€";
			commentL+="â€¢â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€¢â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€¢"+"\n"+"ğŸ‘¤"+foldlingauthor+subscriptionicon+"ã€€"+"æ‰“åˆ†ï¼š"+commentmark+"ã€€"+"æ‰€è¯„ç« èŠ‚ï¼š"+pchapterid+vip_chapter_icon+"\n"+commentbody+"\n"+agreenum+"æ¥è‡ª"+ip_pos+"ã€€å‘è¡¨æ—¶é—´ï¼š"+commentdate+"\n"
			};
		} else {
		commentL = ""
		};
	A+"\n‎\n"+commentL
	} else {
	message = java.getString("$.message")
	}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
id = baseUrl.match(/\d+/);
url = "https://www.doufuyuedu.com/novel/getChapter/"+id;
cookie = cookie.getCookie(url);
token = String(cookie).replace(/XSRF\-TOKEN=|;.*/g,"");
option = {
	"method": "POST",
	"headers": {
		"accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*",
		"accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate, br",
		"accept-language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,zh-TW;q=0.8",
		"referer": baseUrl,
		"Cookie": cookie,
		"x-csrf-token": token
		}
	};
java.ajax(url+","+JSON.stringify(option))
</js>

<js>
